TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/ColumnHeaderCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表 控制項中的資料行標頭集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of column headers in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A類別會儲存在資料行標頭中顯示控制何時屬性設定為。A class stores the column headers that are displayed in the control when the property is set to . 儲存物件會定義要如何資料行標頭會顯示在顯示的資料行的文字控制何時顯示資料行。The stores objects that define the text to display for a column as well as how the column header is displayed in the control when displaying columns. 當顯示資料行，項目及其子項目會顯示在自己的資料行。When a displays columns, the items and their subitems are displayed in their own columns. 若要指定的資料行下顯示子項目的資料，請參閱類別。To specify which columns subitem data is displayed under, see the class. 有數種方法來加入至集合的資料行標頭。There are a number of ways to add column headers to the collection. 方法會將單一資料行的標頭加入至集合。The method adds a single column header to the collection. 若要加入集合中的許多資料行的標頭，您建立的陣列物件，並將它傳遞給方法。To add a number of column headers to the collection, you create an array of objects and pass it to the method. 如果您想要在集合中的特定位置插入的資料行標頭，您可以使用方法。If you want to insert a column header at a specific location in the collection, you can use the method. 若要移除資料行標頭，您可以使用方法或方法，如果您知道資料行標頭集合中所在的位置。To remove column headers, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the column header is located in the collection. 方法可讓您移除而不是使用集合中的所有資料行標頭方法一次都移除單一資料行的標頭。The method allows you to remove all column headers from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single column header at a time. 方法和屬性的加入和移除資料行標頭，除了也提供方法來尋找集合中的資料行標頭。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing column headers, the also provides methods to find column headers in the collection. 方法可讓您判斷資料行的標頭是否為集合的成員。The method enables you to determine whether a column header is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道資料行標頭位於集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷資料行的標頭集合中所在的位置。Once you know that the column header is located in the collection, you can use the method to determine where the column header is located in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 當所有資料行的結合的寬度超過 32,768 個像素時，可能會造成非預期的行為。Unexpected behavior can result when the combined width of all columns exceeds 32,768 pixels. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立包含表單的表單控制項，以手動方式排序項目中的資料行時按一下控制項時。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 此範例會定義一個叫做類別`ListViewItemComparer`可實執行介面比較。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 此範例會建立的執行個體`ListViewItemComparer`並使用它來設定屬性控制項。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 方法呼叫中事件處理常式使用中定義的方法`ListViewItemComparer`来執行的項目，根據按下的資料行排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. [!code-cpp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CPP/listviewsort1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CS/listviewsort1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/VB/listviewsort1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個版本的方法，以加入現有至集合。You can use this version of the method to add an existing to the collection. 如果您想要建立新加入至集合時，您可以使用另一個版本方法。If you want to create a new at the time you add it to the collection, you can use the other version of the method. 當您加入資料行標頭時，它們會新增至集合結尾。When column headers are added, they are added to the end of the collection. 若要插入集合中特定位置中的資料行標頭，請使用方法。To insert a column header into the collection at a specific position, use the method. 若要將一組資料行的標頭新增至單一作業中的集合中，使用方法。To add a set of column headers to the collection in a single operation, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立包含表單的表單控制項，以手動方式排序項目中的資料行時按一下控制項時。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 此範例會定義一個叫做類別`ListViewItemComparer`可實執行介面比較。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 此範例會建立的執行個體`ListViewItemComparer`並使用它來設定屬性控制項。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 方法呼叫中事件處理常式使用中定義的方法`ListViewItemComparer`来執行的項目，根據按下的資料行排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. [!code-cpp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CPP/listviewsort1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CS/listviewsort1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/VB/listviewsort1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個版本的方法用來建立新来加入至集合。You can use this version of the method to create a new to add to the collection. 新的文字加入至控制項根據`text`參數。The text of the new added to the control is based on the `text` parameter. 這個版本的方法也可讓您指定資料行標頭中的資料行的寬度和文字的對齊方式。This version of the method also allows you to specify the width of the column and the alignment of text in the column header. 如果您有現有您想要加入至集合，請使用新版方法可接受做為其參數。If you have an existing that you want to add to the collection, use the version of the method that accepts a as its parameter. 當您加入資料行標頭時，它們會新增至集合結尾。When column headers are added, they are added to the end of the collection. 若要插入集合中特定位置中的資料行標頭，請使用方法。To insert a column header into the collection at a specific position, use the method. 若要將一組資料行的標頭新增至單一作業中的集合中，使用方法。To add a set of column headers to the collection in a single operation, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

param.span: ，表示要從集合中移除的資料行行首。

span.span: A representing the column header to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 從集合中移除指定資料行行首。

span.span: Removes the specified column header from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您從集合移除的資料行標頭時，索引將會變更後續的資料行中的標頭集合。When you remove a column header from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent column headers in the collection. 已移除的資料行標頭有關的所有資訊都會都刪除。All information about the removed column header is deleted. 您可以使用這個方法來移除集合中的特定資料行的標頭，藉由指定的實際移除。You can use this method to remove a specific column header from the collection by specifying the actual to remove. 若要指定資料行標頭，而不是資料行標頭本身移除的索引，使用方法。To specify the index of the column header to remove instead of the column header itself, use the method. 若要從集合中移除所有資料行標頭，使用方法。To remove all column headers from the collection, use the method.

summary.span: 移除集合中位於指定索引處的資料行行首。

span.span: Removes the column header at the specified index within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您從集合移除的資料行標頭時，索引將會變更後續的資料行中的標頭集合。When you remove a column header from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent column headers in the collection. 已移除的資料行標頭有關的所有資訊都會都刪除。All information about the removed column header is deleted. 若要從集合中移除特定的資料行標頭，藉由指定要從集合移除的資料行行首的索引，您可以使用這個方法。You can use this method to remove a specific column header from the collection by specifying the index of the column header to remove from the collection. 若要指定資料行標頭，若要移除而不是資料行標頭的索引，使用方法。To specify the column header to remove instead of the index to the column header, use the method. 若要從集合中移除所有資料行標頭，使用方法。To remove all column headers from the collection, use the method.

exception.span: 小於 0，或大於等於 的 屬性值。

param.name: key
param.span: 要從集合中移除之資料行的名稱。

span.span: The name of the column to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 從集合中移除具有指定索引鍵的資料行。

span.span: Removes the column with the specified key from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應至中的資料行的索引鍵。The property corresponds to the key for a column in the . 索引鍵的比較是不區分大小寫。The key comparison is not-case sensitive. 如果`key`已`null`或空字串，不會變更集合`.`If `key` is `null` or an empty string, does not change the collection`.`
